::Diamond::

She walked over to Devilduer and looked at the necklace. "Hmm, come 
to think of it. I have seen a device that is similar, but it wasn't a 
necklace. It was a wrist cuff.  But it did the same thing."  She 
looked at the device.  "But the last time I saw anything remotely lke 
that, it was used by the predacon council."  She shuttered slightly 
and mutters,"slagging bots."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DevilDuer::
> 
> DevilDuer reaches the necklace, bending over to take it and bring 
it 
> back to the other room of the lab. He shruggs.
> 
> "Heck, I've used these things b'fore," he says, "That doesn' help 
me 
> though, there are a bunch of differen' types."
>
